channel.title: [508] Giving owner to anyone who tells me how to make Kree'arra aggressive?
channel.description:
Okay well I just can't figure it out, I'll give owner on my 317 and 508 to anyone that tells me how to, here are the codes:
NPC List [code]npc = 6222 580 255 55 2 1 90 6977 6974 6975 7 Kree'arra Graceful_avatar_of_Armadyl.[/code] NPC Spawn [code]spawn = 6222 2831 5302 2 2840 5306 2826 5298 Kree'ara[/code]

item.title: [508] Giving owner to anyone who tells me how to make Kree'arra aggressive?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs.absX, npcs.absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs.heightLevel)
if (npcs.npcType == IDHERE || npcs.npcType == 6222)
npcs.StartKilling = person.playerId;
npcs.RandomWalk = false;
npcs.IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs.absX, npcs.absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs.heightLevel)
if (npcs.npcType == IDHERE || npcs.npcType == 6222)
{
npcs.RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}
}

item.title: [508] Giving owner to anyone who tells me how to make Kree'arra aggressive?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

if (n.npcType == 50)
{
{
p.combatDelay += 3;
p.requestFaceTo(n.npcId);
p.attackNPC = n.npcId;
p.attackingNPC = true;
}

        n.requestAnim(n.attackEmote, 0);
        p.appendHit(maxHit, 0);
        p.requestAnim(424, 0);
        n.combatDelay = n.attackDelay;
        if (p.autoRetaliate == 0 && !p.attackingNPC) {
            p.combatDelay += 3;
            p.requestFaceTo(n.npcId);
            p.attackNPC = n.npcId;
            p.attackingNPC = true;
        }
    }
}

public void resetAttack(NPC n) {
    Player p = Engine.players[n.attackPlayer];
    if (n == null) {
        return;
    }
    n.attackingPlayer = false;
    // need to cancel the npc facing here, somehow.
}

}

But change the 50 to your Kree’ara npc id.

item.title: [508] Giving owner to anyone who tells me how to make Kree'arra aggressive?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

theres no npchandler lolz do you meen NPCPlayerCombat[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 25, 2009, 02:45:13 pm[/size][hr]because this is in my NPCPlayerCombat…

[code]/*

  • Class NPCPlayerCombat
  • Version 1.0
  • Monday, September 14, 2008
  • Created by ROYALE.
    */

package palidino76.rs2.npcs.combat;

import palidino76.rs2.Engine;
import palidino76.rs2.players.Player;
import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPC;

public class NPCPlayerCombat {
public void attackPlayer(NPC n) {
Player p = Engine.players[n.attackPlayer];
int hitType = Misc.random(5);
int maxHit = Misc.random(n.maxHit);
int offsetX = (n.absX - p.absX) * -1;
int offsetY = (n.absY - p.absY) * -1;

    if (n.attackPlayer <= 0 || n.isDead || p.isDead
            || n.attackPlayer >= Engine.players.length || p == null
            || p.disconnected[1]) {
        resetAttack(n);
    }
    if (n.combatDelay > 0) {
        return;
    }
    if (Misc.getDistance(p.absX, p.absY, n.absX, n.absY) <= 1) {
        n.requestFaceTo(p.playerId + 32768);
		
		/**JAD**/
		if (n.npcType == 2745)
		{
			int jadattack = Misc.random(2);
			int jadhit = Misc.random(50);
			n.combatDelay = n.attackDelay;
			if (p.autoRetaliate == 0 && !p.attackingNPC)
			{
				p.combatDelay += 3;
				p.requestFaceTo(n.npcId);
				p.attackNPC = n.npcId;
				p.attackingNPC = true;
			}
			switch (jadattack)
			{
				case 1:
					n.requestAnim(9276, 0);
					p.appendHit(jadhit, 0);
					p.teleportTo(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 482, 0);
					return;
				case 2:
					n.requestAnim(9277, 0);
					p.appendHit(jadhit, 0);
					return;
				case 0:
					n.requestAnim(9300, 0);
					p.appendHit(jadhit, 0);
					p.teleportTo(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 451, 0);
					return;
			}
		}

		/**KBD**/
		if (n.npcType == 50)
		{
			int kbdattack = Misc.random(1);
			int kbdhit = Misc.random(35);
			int kbdfire = Misc.random(69);
			n.combatDelay = n.attackDelay;
			if (p.autoRetaliate == 0 && !p.attackingNPC)
			{
				p.combatDelay += 3;
				p.requestFaceTo(n.npcId);
				p.attackNPC = n.npcId;
				p.attackingNPC = true;
			}
			switch (kbdattack)
			{
				case 1:
					if (p.equipment[5] == 11284)
					{
						n.requestAnim(81, 0);
						p.appendHit(kbdhit, 0);
						p.teleportTo(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					}
					else
					{
						n.requestAnim(81, 0);
						p.appendHit(kbdfire, 0);
						p.teleportTo(p.absX, p.absY, p.heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
					}
					return;
				case 0:
					n.requestAnim(91, 0);
					p.appendHit(kbdhit, 0);
					return;
			}
		}

        n.requestAnim(n.attackEmote, 0);
        p.appendHit(maxHit, 0);
        p.requestAnim(424, 0);
        n.combatDelay = n.attackDelay;
        if (p.autoRetaliate == 0 && !p.attackingNPC) {
            p.combatDelay += 3;
            p.requestFaceTo(n.npcId);
            p.attackNPC = n.npcId;
            p.attackingNPC = true;
        }
    }
}

public void resetAttack(NPC n) {
    Player p = Engine.players[n.attackPlayer];
    if (n == null) {
        return;
    }
    n.attackingPlayer = false;
    // need to cancle the npc facing here, somehow.
}

}
[/code]

item.title: [508] Giving owner to anyone who tells me how to make Kree'arra aggressive?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Go into NPC handler and look up:

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)

under that put this

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if(p != null && person != null)
{
if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel)
if (npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE || npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE)
npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel)
if (npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE || npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE)
{
npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}
}
